overview:
As Co-founder and COO at Saltbox. Ali is responsible for recruiting and leading the Engineering and Sales teams, to build a simple to use communication and mobile-learning application for the social enterprise. Saltbox unites learning content from the web, company and workforce with speed and mobility to give your sales force a competitive advantage.

Prior to Saltbox, Ali has led large sales teams at T-Mobile, responsible for training, operations, sales, and team development and engagement.

Ali studied Physics & Bioengineering at the University of Washington, where he published research on High Intensity Focused Ultrasound for non-invasive tumor treatment and blood necrosis, IEEE Ultrasonics Symposium.
